Introduction
This topic contains information on the exchange of records between VA, NDRB, and BCNR, including
MOU between VA, NDRB, and BCNR
, and
procedures for obtaining records located at NDRB and BCNR
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G - Record Exchanges Between the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) and the Service Departments
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G
